text:
Tomcat 4.1.x cannot be added to Sun One Studio using full IDE integration; 
This is because of two issues:
1. Lib directory has been moved.
2. JspEngineContext has been removed (ommitted?) from the distribution. The 
source is still tagged in CVS as part of 4_1_18.
creator: sgparry@mainscreen.com

text:
We obviously can't guarantee that a new Tomcat release is going to be 100%
compatible with all the software which integrates Tomcat.
creator: remm@apache.org
